name: copilotprompts-github-powershell-prompt
title: Generate PnP Powershell script using GitHub copilot
shortDescription: Create a PnP PowerShell script to fetch all documents from a given sharepoint site, use ClientID, TenantID & DeviceLogin as parameters
longDescription: Create a PnP PowerShell script to fetch all documents from a given sharepoint site, use ClientID, TenantID & DeviceLogin as parameters.
